roleset.name: sell

example.name: adjectival
example.text: GTE shut down its cafeteria Tuesday afternoon after testing determined that at least one cafeteria worker employed by GTE's private food vending contractor, ARA Services Inc., was suffering from a strain of the virus, officials said.

roleset.note: This file is here only for the two derived nominals, vending and vendor. There is no verb 'vend' any more.
